forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 62F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
